Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController

Class ChooseObjectiveSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController.GenericController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController.ChooseObjectiveSceneController
public class ChooseObjectiveSceneController extends GenericController
third scene of initialization, players can choose their secret objective card from the two objective cards displayed

      public void chatInitObjective()

    • overwriteChat

      public void overwriteChat(ClientChat chat, MiniModel miniModel)
      method implemented from GenericController, invoked by Gui when a message is sent by a player in the chat
      Overrides:
      overwriteChat in class GenericController
      Parameters:
      chat - the chat to be updated
      miniModel - the minimodel to be updated

    • sendObj

      public void sendObj(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws IOException
      created and sends ChooseObjectiveCommand according which of the two buttons is pressed invokes the method init() of ManuscriptSceneController to initialize the graphic of the scene invokes Gui method to switch scene to ManuscriptScene
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggers the method
      Throws:
      IOException - if the scene is not found

    • otherPlayerReconnected

      public void otherPlayerReconnected()
      Description copied from class: GenericController
      Handles the event when another player reconnects to the game. This method is empty and should be overridden in a subclass.
      Overrides:
      otherPlayerReconnected in class GenericController

    • receiveOk

      public void receiveOk(String ackType)
      invoked by Gui in order to send a string to this scene controller, sets what is showed in the actionFeedback label displayed in ManuscriptSceneController before the stage changes scene from this one to the manuscript scene
      Overrides:
      receiveOk in class GenericController
      Parameters:
      ackType - the string to be sent
